msg
The Houkai creatures are absolutely fierce! The road ahead is blocked, mechas can't be transported to the frontier. We have to clear the road, or there will be even more causalities in the frontier.
崩坏生物的攻击太猛烈了！前面的道路都被封锁了！机器人没有办法到达前线！现在前线的伤员很多！得赶紧打通道路才行！

どうした？こんなのでバテちゃったのか？どうやら買い被りだったかな。じゃあ、あんたはここで休んでて。先、行くよっ！負傷者は待ってくれないからね！

What's wrong? Exhausted already? I guess I overestimated you. Well, you rest here. I'm going on ahead! I can't leave the injured waiting!
What's wrong? You're exhausted just like that? It seems that just now or overestimated you ~ then you rest here, the wounded in front of me are still waiting for me!

しっかりしろ！！今、基地に連れて帰る！耐えろ！

C'mon, stay with me!! I'm taking you back to the base now! Hold on!
Hey! Pull yourself together! I'll take you back to the base!
Stay with me! I'm taking him back to base now! Hold on!
Bzzzzz—— (TN: I really don't know how to do an onomatopoeia of ears ringing...)
おい！気をしっかり持て……！
Hey! Keep your head in the game. ......!
又回到了熟悉的光景中。
また見慣れた光景に戻ってきた。
I'm back in this familiar scene.
It's back to the familiar light.
We are back to the familiar scene again.
Maybe I'm already used to this state, because I can't feel any emotional ups and downs.
看来似乎已经习惯了这种状态，内心已经感受不到任何一丝起伏。
この状態に慣れてしまったみたい。異様なのに内心では何の起伏も起こらない。
이 상태에 익숙해져 버린 것 같다. 이상한데 마음속으로는 아무런 동요도 일어나지 않는다.
I seem to have gotten used to this state. It's strange, but I don't feel any ups or downs inside.
It seems to have gotten used to this state of affairs and can no longer feel any hint of ups and downs inside.
It's like I've gotten used to this state of affairs. It's bizarre, yet no ups and downs occur inwardly.
I'm separated with my previous memories. From an unknown start, I'm moving forward to an inevitable end.
之前的记忆仿佛被一刀闸断，从未知的起点开始，朝向必然的终点。
以前の記憶は寸断されてしまったように感じる。未知なる出発点から始まり、必然の終点に向かう。
이전의 기억은 조각나 버린 것처럼 느껴진다. 미지의 출발점에서 시작해 필연의 종점을 향한다.
It feels like my previous memories have been torn apart, beginning from an unknown starting point and heading towards an inevitable end.
The previous memories seem to be cut off with a single stroke, starting from an unknown starting point and heading towards the inevitable end.
The memory of what came before feels like a disconnection. Beginning from an unknown starting point and heading toward an inevitable end point.
The same story in mind is on repeat over and over, but I can do nothing but watch.
如同不断回放的录影带一般反复经历着同一段故事，但是却始终以旁观者的角度无法介入。
繰り返し流している映像のように、同じ出来事を何度も経験している。でも最初から最後まで傍観者の立場で、介入することはできない。
반복해서 재생되는 영상처럼, 같은 사건을 몇 번이고 경험하고 있다. 하지만 처음부터 끝까지 방관자의 입장에서, 개입할 수는 없다.
Like a video being played on repeat, I experience the same events over and over again. But I remain a bystander from the beginning to the end, unable to intervene.
Like a video tape that keeps replaying, I experience the same story over and over again, but I am always unable to intervene from a spectator's point of view.
Like a video played over and over again, we experience the same events over and over again. But from start to finish, we are on the sidelines, unable to intervene.
I've been wondering why I exist in this world, but my mind is cluttered. Simple and basic things is all I can do now...
试图思考着存在于此的理由，但是脑袋却像卡带了一般昏昏沉沉，只能做出最简单的行为——
ここに存在している理由を考えようとしても、頭が固まっちゃったみたいに朦朧として、簡単なことしかできなくなってしまう——
여기에 존재하는 이유를 생각하려고 해도, 머리가 굳어버린 것처럼 멍해져서, 간단한 일밖에 할 수 없게 되어버려——
When I try to think about the reason for my existence here, my mind becomes hazy, as if frozen. I can only do simple things...
Trying to think about the reason for being here, but the head is as dizzy as a cassette tape, and can only perform the simplest of acts -
I try to figure out why I'm here, but I get all fuzzy, like my mind has frozen up, and I can only do the simplest things...
Because I believe she will there at the end of the road.
因为我知道，在路途的尽头，她总会出现在那里。
道の終点に、彼女がそこに現れるって分かっているから。
길의 끝에, 그녀가 거기에 나타날 거란 걸 알고 있으니까.
Because I know she'll always be there at the end of the road.
Because I know that at the end of the road, she will always be there.
At the end of the road, I know she will show up there.
Same face and same posture. She seems to be carved in this meaningless world.
总是同样的表情，总是同样的姿势，仿佛被镌刻在了这无意义的世界中。
いつも同じような表情、いつも同じような姿勢。まるでこの意味のない世界に刻まれているかのように。
언제나 똑같은 표정, 언제나 똑같은 자세. 마치 이 의미 없는 세계에 새겨져 있는 것처럼.
Always the same expression, always the same posture, as if engraved in this meaningless world.
Always the same expression, always the same pose, as if engraved in this meaningless world.
Always the same look, always the same posture. As if inscribed in this meaningless world.
Is she lost in this random world just like me? We're both searching for an exit, waiting to be saved.
她是否也和我一样迷失在不知名的世界中呢？徘徊寻找着出口，等待着谁来救赎。
彼女は私と同じように知らない世界で彷徨っているのかな？出口を探して彷徨い、誰かが助けに来るのを待っている。
그녀는 나와 같이 모르는 세계에서 헤매고 있는 걸까? 출구를 찾아 방황하며, 누군가 구하러 올 때를 기다리고 있는 건지.
I wonder if she's like me, lost in a strange world? Wandering around, searching for a way out, waiting for someone to come to the rescue.
Is she lost in the same unknown world as I am? Wandering around looking for an exit, waiting for someone to save her.
Is she wandering in the same unknown world as I am? Wandering around looking for a way out, waiting for someone to come to her rescue.

ねぇ……名前を教えてくれない？

같은 시공간에 있는 우리라면, 서로의 체온을 느낄 수 있을 텐데…….
